content: copyright feel free to use this pattern for personal use only or in very small quantity ask me before thanks please do not copy it claim as your own sell it thanks for respecting those little rules … **************************** about row 1 and 3 of the pattern everything between parentheses are actions to repeating for the row 1 repeat k to the last st row 3 repeat k to the last st hope that s more understanding sorry for the confusion **************************** yardage fing 4ply needles us 4 - 3 5 mm length of the shawl after blocking 160 cm yarn length 533 m used 453 m **************************** a propos de la laine / about the yarn bonbon arlequin - single merino gradient shop http //filature-de-la-vallee-des-saules fr/boutique/fr/ ravelry account http //www ravelry com/yarns/brands/lily-neige **************************** ceci est une recette ce qui permet un châle ajustable en taille adultes et enfants version en anglais disponible - ***************************** this pattern is kind of recipe which you can do both for adults and children english translation is now available -
